text: Nuko ubwo imanza zizaba zimaze gucibwa, Shitani avuge ati “Mu by’ukuri Allah yabasezeranyije isezerano ry’ukuri (ryo kuzazurwa no kugororerwa). Naho njye isezerano nabahaye sinaryubahirije, kuko nta bubasha nari mbafiteho uretse ko nabahamagaye mukanyitaba. Ku bw’ibyo, ntimumvebe ahubwo mwivebe ubwanyu. (Ubu) nta cyo nabamarira kandi namwe nta cyo mwamarira. Mu by’ukuri njye mpakanye ibikorwa byanyu mwakoze (ubwo mwarekaga kugaragira Allah) mukambangikanya na We. Mu by’ukuri inkozi z’ibibi zirahanishwa ibihano bibabaza.”
